cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("rename")

	RENAME("old", "new")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: rename
processors:
  - rename:
      tag: rename_old_to_new_1c0a2c60
      field: old
      target_field: new
